attributes.action: Tougher Sentencing for Drivers found guilty of killing cyclists
attributes.background: I'm appalled at the sentences drivers are given when they are found guilty of death by careless driving. Bans and suspended sentences. This is sending out the wrong message that cyclists lives don't matter.
